item.title: Trump: Biden Autopen One of 'Biggest' Scandals Ever
item.description: President Donald Trump is putting the "scandal" of former President Joe Biden's autopen executive actions up among the "biggest, ever."

item.title: N.Y. Village Orders Resident to Remove Pro-Trump Flag
item.description: A Democrat stronghold in the New York City suburbs is trying to force a property owner to remove a pro-Trump flag.
